name: aiu-dance-lambda
description: AWS Lambda functions for AIU Dance app - Stripe integration and webhooks

scripts.deploy:checkout: npm run build:checkout && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name aiu-dance-create-checkout --zip-file fileb://createCheckoutStripe.zip
scripts.deploy:webhook: npm run build:webhook && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name aiu-dance-stripe-webhook --zip-file fileb://stripe_webhook.zip
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:checkout && npm run deploy:webhook

author: AIU Dance Team
